Text:
Iboga, Detox or Die - the addiction stopper

Info Dvd 2 - 2 hrs 1 min - 720 x 480 - NTSC

second dvd-r in a serie of info dvd's about Iboga & Ibogaine

This edition features f.i. the BBC documentary Detox or Die, an highly interesting docu following people who quit with the help of Ibogaine.

Iboga, News Clips and seminar - the addiction stopper

Info Dvd 3 - 1 hrs 54 min - 720 x 480 - NTSC

third dvd-r in a serie of info dvd's about Iboga & Ibogaine

This edition features f.i. a compilation of international news features, as well as a Dutcht seminar about Iboga, providing further info.

Iboga, That Channel Iboga Seminar - the addiction stopper

Info Dvd 4 - 1 hrs 52 min - 720 x 480 - NTSC

fourth dvd-r in a serie of info dvd's about Iboga & Ibogaine

This edition features f.i. a complete Iboga seminar

Iboga, Facing the Habits - the addiction stopper

Info Dvd 5 - 1 hrs 40 min - 720 x 480 - NTSC

fifth dvd-r in a serie of info dvd's about Iboga & Ibogaine

This edition features the documentary style movie Facing the Habits, following an addicts detox tour with Iboga and Ibogaine.

Iboga, Babongo Trice Initiation Ceremony - BBC2 - the addiction stopper

Info Dvd 6 - 59 min - 720 x 480 - NTSC

sixth dvd-r in a serie of info dvd's about Iboga & Ibogaine

This edition features the documentary made about Iboga, following the Babongo Tribe Initiation Ceremony with Iboga and Ibogaine.
